content: please feel free to use this pattern for charity knitting materials 1 skein 50gm/1 5oz bernat handicrafter cotton or other dk-weight cotton yarn tapestry needle 3 5mm us 4 uk 9 needles or needles that will match your yarn choice pattern notes this washcloth is worked from tip to tip where the first half of the project increases a stitch each row and the second half of the project decreases a stitch each row
